name: Recursive Theory of Art
description: This work is a collaboration between the artists Gustavo Manute and Rodrigo Cid. The frame is gilded to present the economic strength of artistic institutions, and it rotates with the intention of indicating the artist's movement around these institutions, in order to bring his work to the public's appreciation. The work is a criticism of this unequal relationship between artist and institution, which persists despite the decentralization caused by the NFTs.
